title: Trust begins with verification
description: Whether it’s an address, a call, or a message, let us confirm its true identity first. Peace of mind is the best partner on the investing journey.
safetyTip1Desc: Pick the type you’re concerned about.
safetyTip2Desc: Provide a unique identifier (URL, ID, etc.).
safetyTip3Desc: If it isn’t in our records, stop interacting immediately.

dialog.unverifiedMessage: This information isn’t in our database. Caution!
